entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as the eldest son of the Weasley family. He works as a curse breaker for Gringotts Wizarding Bank.

entities.name: gringotts wizarding bank
entities.description: Gringotts Wizarding Bank is mentioned as Bill's workplace.

entities.name: weasley family
entities.description: The Weasley family is mentioned as a whole. They will be spending a month in Egypt and returning for the start of the new school year at Hogwarts.

entities.name: egypt
entities.description: Egypt is mentioned as the destination where the Weasley family will spend a month.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as the school that the Weasley children currently attend.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the Weasley children. He is shown in a moving photograph waving at Harry with his pet rat Scabbers on his shoulder.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is mentioned as Ron's pet rat.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as one of the Weasley children. She is shown in a moving photograph waving at Harry with her brother Ron.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who is looking at a moving photograph of the Weasleys.

relationships.description: Bill works for Gringotts Wizarding Bank.
The Weasley family will be spending a month in Egypt.
Five of the Weasley children currently attend Hogwarts.
Ron owns Scabbers, his pet rat.
